sound.name: Encaixe
sound.description: Generic sound used when something dovetails with something else.

sound.name: Challenge
sound.description: This sound is played when the character explains the goals of the game.

sound.name: TimeOut
sound.description: This sound clip is played when the time is over

sound.name: TryAgain
sound.description: Played when the player makes a mistake and has another chance

sound.name: Opening
sound.description: Played at the title screen. It always says the name of the game

sound.name: Quit
sound.description: Played in the Quit confirmation screen

sound.name: FeedbackLevel1
sound.description: Played when the player wins the first level
